data.title: Yip Harburg Lyric Foundation/FFRF Scholarship
data.meta_description: The Yip Harburg Lyric Foundation/FFRF Scholarship is available to students who are activists for secular values. Students studying the arts are encouraged to apply.
data.text:
About the Scholarship

The Yip Harburg Lyric Foundation/FFRF Scholarship is available to students who are activists for secular values. Students studying the arts are encouraged to apply.
